data.name: Moon Whalers
data.detailed_description:
Gather your Crew and Shoot and Dodge your way through an Endless Wave of Space Whales to become a Moon Whaler!!

The easy-one touch controls are simple to learn, but offers a very immersive and expressive game play experience!

Features
-Free-to-play Shoot'em up action
-Simple 1-touch Controls
-Edge of your seat Arcade Style Gameplay
-Endless Bullet Hell Action with an Infinite Combination of Creatures and Attacks
-Featuring Cute Art by KittyNaut: Cutest shop in the galaxy
-Earn Prestige to unlock Collectable Unlockable Skins
-Various Crew Members that act as Powerups
data.about_the_game:
Gather your Crew and Shoot and Dodge your way through an Endless Wave of Space Whales to become a Moon Whaler!!

data.short_description: Cutest Bullet Hell In the Galaxy! Recruit captains and crewmates to become a Moonwhaler! Battle through endless waves of Space Whales in search of the legendary White Whale.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
